blocks.name: crpss
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the reified proper subset relation.

blocks.name: df-rpss
blocks.content: Define a relation which corresponds to proper subsethood ~ df-pss on sets. This allows us to use proper subsethood with general concepts that require relations, such as strict ordering, see ~ sorpss . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: relrpss
blocks.content: The proper subset relation is a relation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: brrpssg
blocks.content: The proper subset relation on sets is the same as class proper subsethood. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm brrpssg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, crpss, c0), wpss(c2, c0)))
} = {
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, crpss, c0), wpss(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, crpss, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex1i(c2, crpss, c0)
  relrpss()
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wpss(c2, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wpss(c2, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, c1), wpss(c2, c0), wcel(c2, universe), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  pssss(c2, c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, c0, universe)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wb(wbr(c2, crpss, c0), wpss(c2, c0)))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, universe, crpss, wpss(c2, c0), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wpss(c2, cv(hs1)))
  psseq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  psseq2(cv(hs1), c0, c2)
  df-rpss(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wpss(c2, c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wpss(c2, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brrpssg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[⊊]c0 ↔ c2 ⊊ c0))
} = {
  pm5.21nd(c0 ∈ c1, c2[⊊]c0, c2 ⊊ c0, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  anim12i(c0 ∈ c1, c2[⊊]c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c2, crpss, c0)
  relrpss()
  jca((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ⊊ c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊊ c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊊ c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  pssss(c2, c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, c0, universe)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c2[⊊]c0 ↔ c2 ⊊ c0))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, universe, crpss, c2 ⊊ c0, hs0 ⊊ hs1, c2 ⊊ hs1)
  psseq1(hs0, c2, hs1)
  psseq2(hs1, c0, c2)
  df-rpss(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 ⊊ c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c2 ⊊ c0)
}

blocks.name: brrpss
blocks.content: The proper subset relation on sets is the same as class proper subsethood. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: porpss
blocks.content: Every class is partially ordered by proper subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm porpss(class c0) {
  |- wpo(crpss, c0)
} = {
  mpbir(wpo(crpss, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs2))))))))
  rgen2w(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, wral(hs2, c0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs2))))))
  rgenw(hs2, c0, wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs2)))))
  mpbir2an(wa(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs2)))), wn(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  pssirr(cv(hs0))
  psstr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  anbi12i(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs2))), wn(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), wi(wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  notbii(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs0)), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  brrpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  imbi12i(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs2)), wa(wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs0), crpss, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), crpss, cv(hs2)), wpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  brrpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  brrpss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  brrpss(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  vex(hs2)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, crpss, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(crpss)
  diff.hs1.c(crpss)
  diff.hs2.c(crpss)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm porpss(class c0) {
  ⊢ ⊊ ⪯ c0
} = {
  mpbir(⊊ ⪯ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(¬ hs0[⊊]hs0 ∧((hs0[⊊]hs1 ∧ hs1[⊊]hs2)→ hs0[⊊]hs2))))))
  rgen2w(hs0, hs1, c0, c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(¬ hs0[⊊]hs0 ∧((hs0[⊊]hs1 ∧ hs1[⊊]hs2)→ hs0[⊊]hs2))))
  rgenw(hs2, c0, (¬ hs0[⊊]hs0 ∧((hs0[⊊]hs1 ∧ hs1[⊊]hs2)→ hs0[⊊]hs2)))
  mpbir2an((¬ hs0[⊊]hs0 ∧((hs0[⊊]hs1 ∧ hs1[⊊]hs2)→ hs0[⊊]hs2)), ¬ hs0 ⊊ hs0, ((hs0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊊ hs2)→ hs0 ⊊ hs2))
  pssirr(hs0)
  psstr(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  anbi12i(¬ hs0[⊊]hs0, ((hs0[⊊]hs1 ∧ hs1[⊊]hs2)→ hs0[⊊]hs2), ¬ hs0 ⊊ hs0, ((hs0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊊ hs2)→ hs0 ⊊ hs2))
  notbii(hs0[⊊]hs0, hs0 ⊊ hs0)
  brrpss(hs0, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  imbi12i((hs0[⊊]hs1 ∧ hs1[⊊]hs2), hs0[⊊]hs2, (hs0 ⊊ hs1 ∧ hs1 ⊊ hs2), hs0 ⊊ hs2)
  anbi12i(hs0[⊊]hs1, hs1[⊊]hs2, hs0 ⊊ hs1, hs1 ⊊ hs2)
  brrpss(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  brrpss(hs1, hs2)
  brrpss(hs0, hs2)
  vex(hs2)
  df-po(hs0, hs1, hs2, crpss, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(crpss)
  diff.hs1.c(crpss)
  diff.hs2.c(crpss)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: sorpss
blocks.content: Express strict ordering under proper subsets, i.e. the notion of a chain of sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm sorpss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wor(crpss, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wor(crpss, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wo(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), crpss, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), crpss, cv(s0))))), wa(wpo(crpss, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), crpss, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), crpss, cv(s0)))))))
  biantrur(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), crpss, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), crpss, cv(s0))))), wpo(crpss, c0))
  porpss(c0)
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c0, c0, wo(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), crpss, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), crpss, cv(s0))))
  bitr4i(wo(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), crpss, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), crpss, cv(s0))), w3o(wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wpss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  sspsstri(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  3orbi123i(wbr(cv(s0), crpss, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), crpss, cv(s0)), wpss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wpss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  brrpss(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  biid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  brrpss(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  df-so(s0, s1, crpss, c0)
  diff.crpss.s(s0)
  diff.crpss.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sorpss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (⊊ ≺ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s1 ∨ s1 ⊆ s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(⊊ ≺ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s1 ∨ s1 ⊆ s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[⊊]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[⊊]s0))), (⊊ ⪯ c0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[⊊]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[⊊]s0)))))
  biantrur(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[⊊]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[⊊]s0))), ⊊ ⪯ c0)
  porpss(c0)
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c0, c0, (s0 ⊆ s1 ∨ s1 ⊆ s0), (s0[⊊]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[⊊]s0))
  bitr4i((s0 ⊆ s1 ∨ s1 ⊆ s0), (s0[⊊]s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1[⊊]s0), (s0 ⊊ s1 ∨ s0 = s1 ∨ s1 ⊊ s0))
  sspsstri(s0, s1)
  3orbi123i(s0[⊊]s1, s0 = s1, s1[⊊]s0, s0 ⊊ s1, s0 = s1, s1 ⊊ s0)
  brrpss(s0, s1)
  vex(s1)
  biid(s0 = s1)
  brrpss(s1, s0)
  vex(s0)
  df-so(s0, s1, crpss, c0)
  diff.crpss.s(s0)
  diff.crpss.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: sorpssi
blocks.content: Property of a chain of sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm sorpssi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wo(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wo(wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1)), w3o(wpss(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wpss(c2, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), w3o(wpss(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wpss(c2, c1)), w3o(wbr(c1, crpss, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, crpss, c1)))
  solin(crpss, c0, c1, c2)
  3orbi123d(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wbr(c1, crpss, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wbr(c2, crpss, c1), wpss(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wpss(c2, c1))
  syl(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wb(wbr(c1, crpss, c2), wpss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  ad2antll(wor(crpss, c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c0)
  brrpssg(c2, universe, c1)
  biidd(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wb(wbr(c2, crpss, c1), wpss(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  ad2antrl(wor(crpss, c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  elex(c1, c0)
  brrpssg(c1, universe, c2)
  sspsstri(c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sorpssi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0))→(c1 ⊆ c2 ∨ c2 ⊆ c1))
} = {
  sylibr((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∨ c2 ⊆ c1), (c1 ⊊ c2 ∨ c1 = c2 ∨ c2 ⊊ c1))
  mpbid((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), (c1 ⊊ c2 ∨ c1 = c2 ∨ c2 ⊊ c1), (c1[⊊]c2 ∨ c1 = c2 ∨ c2[⊊]c1))
  solin(crpss, c0, c1, c2)
  3orbi123d((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), c1[⊊]c2, c1 = c2, c2[⊊]c1, c1 ⊊ c2, c1 = c2, c2 ⊊ c1)
  syl((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), (c1[⊊]c2 ↔ c1 ⊊ c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ad2antll(⊊ ≺ c0, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c2, c0)
  brrpssg(c2, universe, c1)
  biidd((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), c1 = c2)
  syl((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), (c2[⊊]c1 ↔ c2 ⊊ c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ad2antrl(⊊ ≺ c0, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c1, c0)
  brrpssg(c1, universe, c2)
  sspsstri(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: sorpssun
blocks.content: A chain of sets is closed under binary union. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sorpssun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0))
} = {
  mpjaod(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0), wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  simprr(wor(crpss, c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  sylbi(wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cun(c1, c2), c2))
  ssequn1(c1, c2)
  eleq1(cun(c1, c2), c2, c0)
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wss(c2, c1), wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  simprl(wor(crpss, c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  sylbi(wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(cun(c1, c2), c1))
  ssequn2(c2, c1)
  eleq1(cun(c1, c2), c1, c0)
  sorpssi(c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sorpssun(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0))→(c1 ⋃ c2)∈ c0)
} = {
  mpjaod((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), (c1 ⋃ c2)∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2, c2 ⊆ c1)
  syl5ibrcom((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), c1 ⊆ c2, (c1 ⋃ c2)∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0)
  simprr(⊊ ≺ c0, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0)
  sylbi(c1 ⊆ c2, ((c1 ⋃ c2)∈ c0 ↔ c2 ∈ c0), (c1 ⋃ c2)= c2)
  ssequn1(c1, c2)
  eleq1((c1 ⋃ c2), c2, c0)
  syl5ibrcom((⊊ ≺ c0 ∧(c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)), c2 ⊆ c1, (c1 ⋃ c2)∈ c0, c1 ∈ c0)
  simprl(⊊ ≺ c0, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0)
  sylbi(c2 ⊆ c1, ((c1 ⋃ c2)∈ c0 ↔ c1 ∈ c0), (c1 ⋃ c2)= c1)
  ssequn2(c2, c1)
  eleq1((c1 ⋃ c2), c1, c0)
  sorpssi(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: sorpssin
blocks.content: A chain of sets is closed under binary intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sorpssin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0))
} = {
  mpjaod(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0), wss(c1, c2), wss(c2, c1))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wor(crpss, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c1, c0))
  simprl(wor(crpss, c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  sylbi(wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cin(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), c1))
  df-ss(c1, c2)

blocks.content: The componentwise complement of a chain of sets is also a chain of sets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
